div.a: The Best Tech Ad I've Seen Lately

div.div: The ad was spotted on the back of a recent TIME magazine.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10T5JHe&via=Digg&text=The Best Tech Ad I've Seen Lately

div.a: Alleged Shoplifter Dies After Being Tackled By Walmart Workers

div.div: The Black Friday shopping weekend apparently took a tragic turn early Sunday morning when an alleged shoplifter died while being apprehended by employees and a contract security officer outside a Lithonia Walmart.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S5be1X&via=Digg&text=Alleged Shoplifter Dies After Being Tackled By Walmart Workers

div.a: The Cost Of Powering The Internet

div.div: The cost of powering the Internet, which is 1.5% of global electricity, is 8.5 billion dollars annually.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WiJjzG&via=Digg&text=The Cost Of Powering The Internet

div.div: IF ONLY LIFE WERE THIS SIMPLE
What you think will happen, happens, but in the most adorable way possible.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U2DMc9&via=Digg&text=Dog's Reaction To 'Bath' And 'Walk'

div.a: Gay Women Will Marry Your Boyfriends

div.div: Earlier this month CollegeHumor posted a video which gay men threaten to marry the girlfriends of men who don’t support gay marriage. Now gay women are taking their turn.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uzh388&via=Digg&text=Gay Women Will Marry Your Boyfriends

div.div: Whether in 50 or 100 or 200 years, there’s a good chance that New York City will sink beneath the sea.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tcw3Hi&via=Digg&text=Is This The End?

div.a: Savoring Time As The Internet's Favorite Punching Bag

div.div: “Are you . . . ” the student says, then pauses and takes a big swallow. He’s about to call a stranger a bad name. “Are you, um, Scumbag Steve?” “Yeah, man.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XMgY6I&via=Digg&text=Savoring Time As The Internet's Favorite Punching Bag

div.a: Facebook Removes Risqué Photograph Of Woman Showing An Elbow

div.div: Are photo-sharing website content policies based on indecency or the mere appearance of indecency? That’s what visual web magazine Theories of the deep understanding of things decided to test out yesterday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TkqfvG&via=Digg&text=Facebook Removes Risqué Photograph Of Woman Showing An Elbow

div.a: White House Drafting A Rule Book For The 'Kill List'

div.div: The secret list the White House uses to determine who to target with a drone strike, known as the 'kill list' -- or 'disposition matrix,' whatever -- is still highly classified, but we know there isn't a hard-and-fast set of rules they follow. Well, it seems like there will be soon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U5Eh5d&via=Digg&text=White House Drafting A Rule Book For The 'Kill List'

div.a: Secrets Of The U.S. Military Spaceplane

div.div: As the US Air Force prepares for the third launch of its mysterious X-37B vehicle, a look at what is known about the classified project.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U5JjP0&via=Digg&text=Secrets Of The U.S. Military Spaceplane

div.div: The alcohol industry was one of the first to figure out that sex sells any product. Here are ten alcohol ads that really push the boundaries of good taste.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QcEbKM&via=Digg&text=The Ten Naughtiest Alcohol Ads

div.div: You are standing behind a very large stranger on a footbridge above rail tracks. The only way to save five people is to heave the stranger over. He will fall to a certain death. But his considerable girth will block the trolley, saving five lives. Should you push him?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UZDGRi&via=Digg&text=Are You A Psychopath?

div.a: How China's Once In A Decade Party Congress Was Photographed

div.div: A look at how Reuters photographed China's highly choreographed leadership transition.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TeYu7V&via=Digg&text=How China's Once In A Decade Party Congress Was Photographed

div.a: New Vaccine May Give Lifelong Protection From Flu

div.div: In a first for any infectious disease, a vaccine against flu has been made out of messenger RNA (mRNA) – the genetic material that controls the production of proteins.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SmM7r5&via=Digg&text=New Vaccine May Give Lifelong Protection From Flu

div.a: Nintendo's Penis Drawing Detection Took Weeks To Develop

div.div: In a recent Iwata Asks interview about the Wii U Miiverse social network, director Yoshiomi Kurisu and his team discuss how difficult it was to create auto-detection of penis drawings.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T5GVqk&via=Digg&text=Nintendo's Penis Drawing Detection Took Weeks To Develop

div.a: Newly Evolved Gene May Have Changed Humans' Brains

div.div: Not the only gene that separates us from other apes, but an interesting one.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rb5o26&via=Digg&text=Newly Evolved Gene May Have Changed Humans' Brains

div.a: Putin Is Going Through His Own David Petraeus Scandal

div.div: In its own internal shake up, Putin's inner circle may be going through a scandal that is eerily similar to America's David Petraeus episode.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Nzn0O&via=Digg&text=Putin Is Going Through His Own David Petraeus Scandal

div.a: The Most Incredible Photographs Of Volcanic Eruptions

div.div: Here is a selection of the most incredible photographs of volcanic eruptions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QiSsWt&via=Digg&text=The Most Incredible Photographs Of Volcanic Eruptions

div.a: How To Increase Your Drinking Tolerance

div.div: So, you've got your fancy pants on. You're heading to the holiday party, and you're intent on impressing your bosses, in-laws, or significant other's friends with your worldliness and savoir-faire. Then you get too drunk, break stuff, offend people, get fired and/or dumped, and effectively ruin your life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R6h06m&via=Digg&text=How To Increase Your Drinking Tolerance

div.div: WILL NOW GOOGLE TRANSLATE ALL DECISIONS

div.a: You Are More Logical When You're Speaking A Foreign Language

div.div: Participants made more rational decisions when money-related choices were posed in a foreign language that they had learned in a classroom setting than when they were asked in a native tongue.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RglW49&via=Digg&text=You Are More Logical When You're Speaking A Foreign Language

div.div: Do you like traveling? Eliminating targets? The UK government's officially-sponsored job site has the perfect opportunity waiting for you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tg0OeW&via=Digg&text=U.K. Government Advertises Fake 007 Position
